content.question: In paragraph 5, sentence 3 (“That’s part . . . shadow and light”), the author develops a metaphor regarding stories that serves primarily to

choices.label: imply that many people view these stories as having magical powers
illustrate the wide range of the potential effects stories can have
indicate that different cultures value different kinds of stories
demonstrate why it is difficult to find a single meaning in a story

content.answer: illustrate the wide range of the potential effects stories can have

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
